mapper.select: SELECT s.series_name AS series_name, u.series_id AS series_id, s.series_images AS series_images, COUNT(1) AS nums, snp.publisher AS publisher_name, snp.pic AS publisher_pic FROM star_nft_user_theme u LEFT JOIN star_nft_series s ON u.series_id = s.id LEFT JOIN star_nft_publisher snp ON s.publisher_id = snp.id WHERE u.user_id = #{userId} AND u.`status` = #{status} AND s.series_type = #{themeType} AND u.is_delete = 0 GROUP BY u.series_id

SELECT t.theme_name AS theme_name, u.series_theme_info_id AS theme_id, t.theme_pic AS theme_images, COUNT(1) AS nums, snp.publisher AS publisher_name, snp.pic AS publisher_pic FROM star_nft_user_theme u LEFT JOIN star_nft_theme_info t ON u.series_theme_info_id = t.id LEFT JOIN star_nft_publisher snp ON t.publisher_id = snp.id WHERE u.user_id = #{userId} AND u.`status` = #{status} AND t.theme_type = #{themeType} AND u.series_id = #{seriesId} AND u.is_delete = 0 GROUP BY u.series_theme_info_id
